    • runPhase

      private void runPhase(MatchPhase phase, int AssistantCardIndex, int islandDestination, boolean moveToIsland, int motherNatureSteps, int cloudIdx) throws StudentMovementInvalidException, AssistantCardNotPlayableException, CloudPickInvalidException
      Method that executes a match phase and performs the related checks
      Parameters:
      phase - The match phase to run
      AssistantCardIndex - The assistant card index to choose
      islandDestination - The destination island for students
      moveToIsland - Whether it moves to an island or to the dining room
      motherNatureSteps - The number of mother Nature steps
      cloudIdx - The picked cloud index
      Throws:
      StudentMovementInvalidException - If the student movement is invalid
      AssistantCardNotPlayableException - If the assistant card cannot be played
      CloudPickInvalidException - If the cloud cannot be picked
